group_1.textLeft: ...It's been two days since then.@Is everything okay on your end?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I managed.
My family cried...
And I got told off at my part-time job...
But that's about it.

group_1.textLeft: How's your sister feeling...?

group_1.textRight: Sayumi's doing well.
She wanted to thank you for@finding her stuffed animal.

group_1.textLeft: We're always happy to help!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*...@I'll bring her next time.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, I'm looking forward to it.

group_1.textRight: Umm, your group is still facing a lot of trouble...
There's still bad rumors going around about@your work...

group_1.textLeft: It's going to affect us for a while, but...
It's okay. They'll gradually come to understand@what happened.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm sorry, I know it's my fault that@rumors got out...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.
You're alive, and we're still able to@work as bodyguards.

group_1.textRight: ...Thank you.
...Oh, right, today I wanted to give you these.

group_1.textLeft: Two Grief Seeds...?

group_1.textRight: You haven't received your payment yet, right?@One for me, and one for my sister.

group_1.textLeft: One is enough as payment.

group_1.textRight: Just one isn't enough...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Then, we'll take one as payment for saving you.

group_1.textRight: But, the payment for saving my sister...

group_1.textLeft: ...I would like you to advertise us as bodyguards@in exchange.

group_1.textRight: You want me to advertise...?

group_1.textLeft: The three of us were just talkin' about it!
You don't need to pay us a Grief Seed.
We just want you to advertise!

group_1.textRight: But, why advertise...?

group_1.textLeft: We intend to build an understanding through@our future activities, but...
The rumor that we caused the death of a client...
That bad impression won't go away easily...
That's why we would like you to promote our work@as the living witness.

group_1.textRight: ...Are you sure that's all you want?

group_1.textLeft: It's very important to us.
It would be great if you could take care of it for us,@but...

group_1.textRight: ...Okay, that's fine. I'll advertise all you want!

group_1.textLeft: Great! We'll leave it to you.

group_1.textRight: I don't want you all to be punished@because of me.
I'll be sure to promote you until@your reputation is restored.

group_1.textLeft: That's very reassuring.
We're countin' on ya, Sae!

group_1.textRight: Okay.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, but you don't need to do too much, okay?
You also have something you want to accomplish,@don't you?

group_1.textRight: Ahhh, yes...but it won't be happening@anytime soon.

group_1.textLeft: What do you want to do, Sae...?
...Ah, but you don't have to answer that if@you don't want to...

group_1.textRight: What I want to do is...
...live a rich, luxurious life with my family...@I guess you could say?

group_1.textLeft: ...I kinda feel like you're skirting around the topic,@but...
You mean you wanna live happily with@your family, right?
You're just like us, after all!

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:305501:cheek_0:eyeClose_1][chara:305501:lipSynch_1]Maybe you're right.
...Ah, it's almost time for my shift.
I'll be off now.

group_1.textLeft: See ya later, Sae!

group_1.textRight: I'll get in touch with you later for the details of@our advertisement.

group_1.textLeft: ...See you later, Sae.

group_1.textRight: Yes, later!

group_1.narration: In order for the three of us to survive,@and to respect Ayame's wish to help her friends,@we started working as bodyguards.
Compared to the time when@we were maintaining neutrality@by not getting involved with anyone,@we faced greater adversity, but...
After being involved with other people,@and learning more about other Magical Girls,@we have a more positive outlook on our own change.

"I promise to change the way I live as a Magical Girl"...@I'll never forget the promise the three of us made,@and I hope we can make the future a little brighter@for those of us burdened with this harsh fate...
